Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • Person
      • Student

  • public class Student
extends Person
    Student, a the person enrolled in school. Student is an extended identity from a person as we can be whoever we wanted to be.
    Since:
    2018-10-1
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    4 Friends and Yoong Wei
